Title: Undocumented migrants use CBP One app to get legal status

Fact vs Fiction.Desc: So there's an application called the CBP One app where you can go on as an illegal migrant, apply for asylum or apply for parole and be granted legal status at the wave of a Kamala Harris open border wand. That is not a person coming in, applying for a green card and waiting for 10 years.

Analysis.Statement: So there's an application called the CBP One app
Analysis.Rationale: Customs and Border Patrol has published a free mobile application called the CBP One app to organize entry interviews and the port of entry

Analysis.Statement: Where you can go on as an illegal migrant
Analysis.Rationale: CBP One can be used only if the person is outside the US and trying to come in through a point of entry. This is checked through geofence.

Analysis.Statement: Apply for asylum or apply for parole
Analysis.Rationale: Haitian nationals can apply for three statuses in the USA. Asylum, Parole, and/or Temporary Protected Status. The processes for each remains unchanged with DHS or DoS. CBP One application is ONLY book appointments at the Port of Entries into the USA.

Analysis.Statement: And be granted legal status at the wave of a Kamala Harris open border wand
Analysis.Rationale: Criteria for applying for asylum or parole or temporary protected status has not changed because of CBP One app.

Analysis.Statement: That is not a person coming in, applying for a green card and waiting for 10 years
Analysis.Rationale: The users of CBP One application, are not legal immigrants. They are asylum seekers, parole seekers, and temporary protected status seekers who are legal NON-immigrants. They are considered aliens and only have temporary permission to stay in USA.
